tokens.resolved_gloss: to mar (especially by breaking); figuratively, to split the ears (with sound), i.e. shout (for alarm or joy)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)

tokens.resolved_gloss: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
